entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or freezing rain late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
